long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Productivity with Glinks: The Ultimate Go Links Extension

Say goodbye to endless searches through bookmarks and messages. Glinks revolutionizes how you access resources, making productivity effortless with go links. Whether it's websites, documents, or internal tools, create and share short, memorable links instantly.

Key Features:

🎯 Create Unlimited Go Links: Tailor links for everything from projects to policies, effortlessly.

🔐 Secure Sharing: Share links securely within your team.

🛠️ Admin Control: Manage, track usage, and customize settings via a user-friendly dashboard.

🔍 Dynamic Links: Set up dynamic placeholders for personalized links tailored to specific needs.

🔎 Effortless Deployment: Seamless integration with Chrome, powered by a battle-tested codebase.

🔐 Single Sign-On: Supports G Suite / Google single sign-on, with Microsoft, OKTA, and OneLogin compatibility coming soon.

🔍 Search Capability: Easily find any go link across your organization with our intuitive search feature.

🔒 Privacy-Focused: Minimal permissions ensure privacy; no access to webpage content.

Experience Glinks today and transform how your team navigates. Simplify access, elevate productivity.
